name: Aurorus
flavorText: The diamond-shaped crystals on its body expel air as cold as -240 degrees Fahrenheit, surrounding its enemies and encasing them in ice.

abilities.name: Ice Shield
abilities.text: Any damage done by an opponent's attack to each of your Water Pokémon that has any Water Energy attached to it is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Icy Wind
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.
